review: It's okay. My crappy internet doesn't help though, and it stops a lot to load. Also, apps like Netflix and Hulu randomly sign out sometimes. There's a lot of icons on the home page, but it's really just a lot of the same crap over and over again. My parents have a Roku, and that is what I will buy next when this craps out on me, or I get sick of it. Another option is a wi-fi connected Blu-Ray player. I had one before that stopped working and that's why I bought the Fire TV. My Blu-Ray player with wi-fi allowed me access Facebook and other websites that this product does not.
